hero.subtitle: Sociologist • Project Mediator • Interdisciplinary Education
hero.tagline: Building bridges between communities, education and conservation

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I am a professional committed to social transformation through education, art and community participation. With more than 15 years of experience in designing, coordinating and leading educational, social and community projects.
about.description: My career is characterized by a deeply participatory approach, centered on people, recognition of local knowledge and the collective construction of situated solutions. I have worked in diverse territorial contexts, from vulnerable communities in Brazil to national-scale programs in Chile.

territorial.title: Territorial Sensitivity
territorial.text: Effective engagement with coastal and rural communities, respecting ancestral knowledge.

participatory.title: Participatory Methods
participatory.text: Facilitation of dialogues, collective mapping and co-creation processes with communities.

education.title: Interdisciplinary Education
education.text: Integration of art, science and technology in transformative educational experiences.

environmental.title: Environmental Awareness
environmental.text: Promoting conservation through community-based and sustainable approaches.

experience.title: Professional Journey
experience.subtitle: Over 15 years building connections between communities, education and territory

kosmofono.title: Producer - Kosmófono Project
kosmofono.org: Faculty of Astronomy, University of Chile
kosmofono.description: Leadership of the National Public Science Fund winning project. A scientific outreach platform that articulates astronomy, sound art and education to translate complex research into accessible experiences.

dirac.title: Consultant - DIRAC
dirac.org: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Chile
dirac.description: Strategic management of international cultural projects. Development of tender documents for Chile Guest of Honor at Frankfurt Book Fair 2027. Design of global-reach reading mediation experiences.

cecrea.title: National Networks & Territory Coordinator
cecrea.org: CECREA Program, Ministry of Cultures, Arts and Heritage
cecrea.description: National lead for strategic partnerships with universities, museums and foundations across 13 regions. Production of large-scale events (500+ participants). Budget management, tenders and interdisciplinary teams.

biblioteca.title: Reading Mediation Manager
biblioteca.org: Gabriela Mistral Regional Library, Coquimbo Region
biblioteca.description: Design and coordination of reading promotion programs, book clubs and literary creation activities. Strengthening territorial alliances and connections with national writers.

maradentro.title: Consultant - Community Relations
maradentro.description: Development of collaborative artistic mediation processes in coastal territories of Valparaíso. Facilitation of collective mapping, territorial drifts and dialogue tables on heritage, landscape and environment.

pnl.title: National Regional Coordinator
pnl.description: Coordination of 'Dialogues in Movement' program across all regions of Chile. Management of inter-institutional alliances with MINEDUC, DIBAM, INJUV and cultural organizations.

techo.title: Social Projects Coordinator
techo.description: Comprehensive coordination of housing projects in 4 settlements. Direct work with communities and social leaders. Strengthening community fabric and local leadership.

spais.title: Servicio País Culture Professional
spais.description: Development of community participation projects in vulnerable neighborhoods of Gorbea. Work with women weavers, promotion of traditional knowledge recognition and training of cultural managers.

onu.title: Internship - UN-Habitat
onu.org: Regional Office for Latin America and the Caribbean, Brazil
onu.description: Community participation assessment in Favela Boa Vista, Niterói. Application of qualitative methodologies, interviews and focus groups. Analysis with Atlas.ti and SPSS.

skills.title: Professional Competencies
skills.subtitle: Capabilities developed over more than a decade of territorial work

strategic.title: Strategic Vision
strategic.text: Planning national-scale programs, articulating institutional objectives with territorial needs.

facilitation.title: Dialogue Facilitation
facilitation.text: Creating meeting spaces between communities, institutions and diverse stakeholders for building agreements.

teamwork.title: Team Coordination
teamwork.text: Leadership of interdisciplinary groups, large-scale event production and support for regional teams.

budget.title: Resource Management
budget.text: Budget administration, tenders, contracts and administrative procedures in public institutions.

territorial.title: Territorial Rootedness
territorial.text: Sensitivity to integrate traditional knowledge, local identities and gender approaches in situated projects.

networks.title: Institutional Networks
networks.text: Building strategic alliances with universities, foundations, museums and public and private organizations.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Initiatives reflecting my commitment to education, community and territory

kosmofono.title: Kosmófono: Science and Music of Black Holes
kosmofono.description: A scientific outreach platform that translates astronomical research into sound and educational experiences. Includes an interactive app, territorial workshops and mediation processes for children, youth and communities.

somos.title: We Are Landscape
somos.description: Collaborative artistic mediation experience in Playa Ancha, Valparaíso. Collective mapping, territorial drifts and dialogue tables on heritage, landscape and environment in the coastal watershed.

cecrea.title: CECREA National Network
cecrea.description: Strengthening the network of Artistic Creation Centers across 13 regions. Partnerships with universities, museums and foundations. Production of national and international arts education gatherings.

dialogos.title: Dialogues in Movement
dialogos.description: National program of encounters between authors and high school students across all regions of Chile. Methodological design, territorial coordination and inter-institutional alliance management.

frankfurt.title: Chile Guest of Honor - Frankfurt Book Fair
frankfurt.description: Strategic management for Chile's participation as Guest of Honor at the Frankfurt International Book Fair 2027. Development of tender documents and design of global-reach reading mediation experiences.

tejedoras.title: Weavers of Gorbea
tejedoras.description: Community participation project focused on recognizing traditional knowledge of women weavers in the Araucanía Region. Training of local cultural managers and promotion of intangible heritage.

habitat.title: Favela Boa Vista Research
habitat.description: Community participation assessment in informal settlements in Niterói, Brazil. Application of qualitative methodologies, in-depth interviews, focus groups and analysis with Atlas.ti and SPSS.

master.title: Interdisciplinary Arts Education
master.description: Training oriented towards the integration of artistic practices, critical education, cultural mediation and pedagogical processes with a social and community focus.

sociology.title: Sociology
sociology.description: Training in social analysis, qualitative and quantitative research, public policy, community development and citizen participation.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Interested in collaborating? I'm available for new opportunities

cta.text: Available for leadership positions in educational, community and participatory conservation projects.
